attributes.action: Request the DWP to consider including a lottery ticket as part of the benefit paid to JSA, IS, IB etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The chance of winning a substantial prize in the National Lottery is far greater that ever getting any practical help from the Department for Work and Pensions. The cost would be minute compared to all of the other idiotic schemes that it creates and would give the claimants something they so desperately need: hope.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
